website_summaries.verdict: This boys' swimsuit set comes with a hat, rash guard, and trunks for top-to-bottom sun protection. Excellent value.
pros: Each piece has a UPF rating of 50+ to protect tender skin
Soft and comfortable with a flexible fit
Trunks come with an adjustable drawstring
Available in a range of colors and prints
cons: Some owners feel the rash guard neck is too narrow

customer_reviews.title: Neckline on the Rash guard is too tight!
customer_reviews.text: Well made, but my toddler cannot stand to wear the shirt. My son is tall and lean, but the rash guard shirt fits like a turtleneck. It’s too snug around his little neck -causing tantrums. I cannot convince him to leave it on. We don’t have this issue with any other rash guard he has. Wish I could return, but I removed the tag after trying on the swim trunks. The swim trunks fit great. Gave 3 stars because the quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Swim suit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this swim suit in size 2T for my chunky 23month old. It fits true to size, and gives him some room to grow - I'm sure it will last us all summer. The quality is great. I love the adorable hat that came with the suit. My little one doesn't like rash guards with long sleeves, so this has been perfect for us. Great purchase, I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Michele c.

customer_reviews.title: The design and colors of this are adorable. My 4 year old fits most standard size ...
customer_reviews.text: The design and colors of this are adorable. My 4 year old fits most standard size 4T clothes from all stores. After reading prior reviews, I ordered a size 5 in this swim set. The shirt just fits (no extra room and very tight to get the neck over his head) and then the trunks are huge on him. I had to go to stores and try to find some shorts that matched the shirt.
customer_reviews.author: MochaMom

customer_reviews.title: Shirt runs small
customer_reviews.text: The neck of the shirt is really small compared to the rest of the shirt. I bought a size 7 and the shorts are true to size but the shirt is smaller than other size 7 swim shirts and the neck is so tight it hurt my son to get it off so I returned it. It would be helpful if the shirt and shorts were sold separately. I also was not happy that I had to pay for return shipping. Be aware that it's not delivered by Amazon so no free return.
customer_reviews.author: David Honkomp

customer_reviews.title: Can’t even put it on
customer_reviews.text: I can’t even get the shirt over my kids head. His head is average size. I ordered true to size but it is huge, shirt and pants. The hat is not so bad and fits pretty well. The shorts hit well below his knees. The colors/pattern is nice and the materials feel high quality. If I ordered a size down though his head definitely wouldn’t fit! I am bummed I can’t even put the shirt on him for our trip in a couple of days...
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Gray

customer_reviews.title: Best suits!!!
customer_reviews.text: These suits for boys and girls are the best! Go from the beach to a casual restaurant to shopping without changing! They keep them so protected my kids live in these in the summer! The neck is tight for my son who has a big head I had to stretch it out. THEY DO RUN SMALL. I get so many compliments on these! The hats are pretty useless for older kids.
customer_reviews.author: DaddyJust

customer_reviews.title: Great set, great price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome price for a 3-pc set. I was hesitant to buy this because of the white sides-- I was worried it would get dingy after swimming in the lake. My son has worn this to the lake, the pool, spray grounds, etc. and I've washed it several times.... It looks just as good as it did the day we got it in the mail.
customer_reviews.author: C.S.

customer_reviews.title: Hat does not have  a string. the bottom does not have a real pull string either.
customer_reviews.text: the hat is a bit too large. does not have a string. the bottom does not have a real pull string either, this makes it difficult to adjust to the actual waist of the baby. If the baby does not wear diapers any longer, it will be considerably loose.
customer_reviews.author: ag

customer_reviews.title: too snug
customer_reviews.text: The swimsuit was too snug for my son despite ordering according to the size chart. The swim shorts are very tight around the hip area and the waistband. My son didn't even get to wear it once. I doubt these are made according to U.S. sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron's parents

customer_reviews.title: My son is two and I bought the 4t and the bottoms are too big and top fits but like a glove so will only get a few wears ...
customer_reviews.text: The top and bottom are not sized appropriately. My son is two and I bought the 4t and the bottoms are too big and top fits but like a glove so will only get a few wears out of it. Get st least 1 size bigger! The pattern is cute and I like the quality minus the fitting. These shorts will probably fall off in the weather but I'm giving it a try.
customer_reviews.author: christina Densley

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandson to use in our pool and the 3T is a perfect fit. The set with the top, shorts, and cute hat are wonderful and these are well made.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer V.

customer_reviews.title: Love the brand and the spf in the swim suit,  disappointed it arrived with loose threading
customer_reviews.text: A little disappointed in the quality. When it arrived the threading was coming out of the shirt. The shirt fits very snug and is somewhat difficult to get over my sons head. Overall this brand does a great job with the SPF in the swim suit. Will post an update of the quality as it gets worn. Unfortunately we don't have time to return before our beach vacation. Will post an update on the quality of how it holds up to a rough toddler.
customer_reviews.author: JcarW10

customer_reviews.title: Best swim outfit ive even bought
customer_reviews.text: This swim outfit is perfect. My son is normally a size 6 but all they had was size 7 so I went ahead and got it. It ended up fitting my son perfectly. He had water play days at school once a week all summer and this out still looks brand new. The colors are very bright and haven't faded at all with over 3 months of regular use.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Cute hat, nice fabric
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson's Easter basket. Always get him a new swimsuit for the summer. Was well made. Hat is very cute.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Fun but runs small
customer_reviews.text: I really like this but it runs very small but the company is quick to respond.this 3t is more like 2t I will have to buy a 4
customer_reviews.author: Hilda b jones

customer_reviews.title: Bad fit
customer_reviews.text: The neck was too narrow to even put it on, trunks were too loose and the waist is not adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice set, my 5 year old loves the swim ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice set, my 5 year old loves the swim trunks and the hat. He wore the top a few times but the neck hole is just on the small side and doesn't have as much stretch as you would expect. If you are buying for a child with a biggish head (like I was) you might want to choose something else.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Runs Very Small
customer_reviews.text: Love the look. Quality is fine. Sizing is the issue. Ordered sz 7 and its none to big for my tall skinny 5 year old grandson. Would have returned but he loves the color and the hat. Fingers crossed that it still fits next summer.
customer_reviews.author: PR

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: This fits great and my son think he looks good in them. Perfect for swimming!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for any child
customer_reviews.text: This item first of all is adorable, fits perfectly just as expected. The hat also fit, which is rarely the case. The quality is excellent and I recommend it to anyone out there.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie M.

customer_reviews.title: Boys swim trunks
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect and the shirt has snap on buttons in the back so it easily fits and can be left loose for comfort. The only thing I wish is that the hat had a tie, everytime the wind blows the hat flies off the head
customer_reviews.author: Sonia

customer_reviews.title: Overall win.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 4T for a 3yo of average height and build. The hat is snug, the shirt fits perfectly, and the shorts are a little big, but can be tied to fit. I wish the hat was bigger; it is the same size as the hat that came with the 2T. My son loves the sharks, and wants to wear the suit all the time. So it is a win.
customer_reviews.author: E Cousar

customer_reviews.title: As ordered.
customer_reviews.text: Stitching was good. No frays. Fits my 3yo. Colors were true to the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Sun Protection and Super cute.
customer_reviews.text: Love this outfit! Fit my toddler perfectly, 4T fit like a 4T. Also, kept his torso sunburn free during our week in Hawaii.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Katsaros

customer_reviews.title: Great Grandson loved them!
customer_reviews.text: They fit as expected and made a six year old very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Pat Bahr

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Now I loved the material and colors of this bathing suit !!!
customer_reviews.author: Nana Of 3

customer_reviews.title: Not True To Size
customer_reviews.text: I returned the 2T. Too small. Returned and ordered 3T. Not much bigger. The child is barely into 2T so what does this tell us? The 2T should have fit or been a little big. Not the case He fits in the 3T but not for long. I would say the sizing is off! Otherwise it’s a really cute and colorful set
customer_reviews.author: lady in waiting

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful design but way too small. Order 2 sizes bigger
customer_reviews.author: Tweety

customer_reviews.title: It looks adorable and has held up well all summer
customer_reviews.text: We get lots of compliments on this matching swim outfit. It looks adorable and has held up well all summer. The rash guard has a snap on the back to help with getting it on and off, which is helpful. I only wish that the hat had a strap to keep it on my little one's head.
customer_reviews.author: panda

customer_reviews.title: The hat was easily blown off
customer_reviews.text: Runs a little small, but our grandson is small for his age so it works out. He loves this outfit so much he wears it for play clothes even when he isn't swimming. The hat was easily blown off. I attached some colorful round cording, and we tie under his chin. Now he will play on the beach for hours , without losing his bonnet!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shirt was much smaller than bottoms and head opening was super small!
customer_reviews.text: Swim trunks and hat fit perfect but top was so small we couldn’t get it over our grandsons head and it looked more like an 18 more than the 3T we ordered. I contacted the company and they have been very kind to remedy the problem by sending another top to replace the original.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Starmer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect from head to toe
customer_reviews.text: Honestly from one mother to countless others, this suit is fantastic! It’s has amazing quality, the color is fantastic, fits perfect, and beyond adorable! I absolutely love this and will be buying more,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: shirt is a bit tighter than I'd like and he won't wear a hat
customer_reviews.text: shirt is a bit tighter than I'd like and he won't wear a hat, but it was still a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: SageAlum

customer_reviews.title: Cute, snug fitting shirt
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. Sizing may run a bit small but. This was a gift for my nephew's son and has not yet been beach tested!
customer_reviews.author: J. Hetherington

customer_reviews.title: To small for the head
customer_reviews.text: The short is great but the t-shirt is to small for the head and my son has a small head
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Maravi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent material and fit
customer_reviews.text: I discovered this brand of swim suits last year, and I am now a brand loyalist. Where else can you get a well-made swim shirt, pants, and reversible hat for such a great price?!
customer_reviews.author: RANG

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute! The quality is great and it was worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is super cute and super comfortable for my guy. He lives it. There are no itchy threads or tags. Even the hat fits his melon head. I will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna A. Richards

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Also a free shirt was sent in the box as a gift from the Skinz Company!! Fits great and washes perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will definitely recommend to family and
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loves this outfit. It fits him very well. Will definitely recommend to family and friends

customer_reviews.title: Needs bigger head hole
customer_reviews.text: The head hole was too small, couldn't fit my son's head through it.
customer_reviews.author: kprice6287

customer_reviews.title: Length was ok, but too tight
customer_reviews.text: 4 yr old is very thin and usually wears 4T. This was too tight that wouldn't fit in a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: Jill S.

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded our expectations!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two sets for our three and five year old grandsons. They looked adorable and were very comfortable as well. Would highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Buy 1 size larger to fit now.
customer_reviews.text: The hole for the head to fit through is too small with little flex. Bought 1 size too large to make sure it fit him. Fits good everywhere else but the head hole.
customer_reviews.author: clint

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Swim Set for my Grandson's 4 year birthday. The 4T ran TTS, and the outfit looked adorable on him! I particularly like that a coordinating hat is included to offer addtional sun protection!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, my Grand-son loved it!!
customer_reviews.text: Swim suit was perfect. My Grandson is 3 years old and I got the size 4. Fit is perfect. The shirt is great to keep their shoulders from burning.

customer_reviews.title: Cute. Cute. Cute.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. Love the matching hat. The neck on the orange and navy top is a mock turtle neck fit...just an fyi.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, and very cute. The top is a bit snug compared to the baggy shorts, but it fits.

customer_reviews.title: It fits our little one

customer_reviews.title: My son was happy with it
customer_reviews.text: We've gotten lots of compliments on this swim outfit. My son was happy with it, and it has held up well over the summer.

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to get on child
customer_reviews.text: It's too difficult to get on the child. I don't think his mother will use it very often. The hat and trunks were cute though

customer_reviews.text: Top is much smaller in comparison to bottom. It's as if they dont go together at all, there not even the same color.

customer_reviews.title: Cute as a button

customer_reviews.title: I am in love with this beach out fit

My son was very small last year when we took him to the beach and we got an outfit similar to this one for him off to uv skins official site. This was just too expensive this year and I was so excited to see the prive on Amazon. I would definite recommend this outfit! It is very helpful if you are scared about your baby getting sunburnt, it protects him completely!

customer_reviews.title: Love it!

customer_reviews.title: Exactly right!
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with the speed of delivery and that this fit my grandson just right.

customer_reviews.title: This is a 6 to 9 month size. I ...
customer_reviews.text: a little small for 12 to 18 months but very cute and my daughter in law loved it for her 10 month old (tall for his age) son

customer_reviews.text: Hats are usually too small for him but this one actually fits well.

customer_reviews.text: Great quality! I bought this one so I could hand down the one I bought 2 years ago to little brother. They both look brand new!

customer_reviews.text: Great quality, color, and fit. Offers great protection for active kids who fight sunscreen. Hat is great addition and offers more sun protection.

customer_reviews.text: Great fit and quality. Really wish the hat had a string to tie or Velcro strap. Babies don't like to wear hats.

product_meta.title: UV SKINZ UPF 50+ Boys 3-Piece Swim Set
feature_bullets: CERTIFIED UPF 50+ – UV SKINZ prides itself on creating sun-protective clothing. This swimsuit set is made of certified UPF 50+ fabric that blocks 98% of UV rays, preventing the burns and skin damage caused by exposure to the sun. UPF 50+ blocks both UVA and UVB rays for maximum protection!

HIGH-QUALITY MATERIALS – The UV SKINZ Boys’ Swim Clothes Set is made of high-quality, breathable fabric. We’ve flat-locked every seam, so there’s nothing to bind or pinch your child’s skin. The longer sleeves and mock tee neck offer perfect upper body coverage and protection from the sun.

LIGHTWEIGHT AND QUICK DRYING – This suit has low water absorbency and helps the body regulate its temperature in cold water and even after a swim. Kids won’t have that heavy, soggy feeling after leaving the pool or the beach.

CHLORINE AND SALTWATER RESISTANT – UV SKINZ Boys’ Swim Set lasts longer than other swimwear because of its chlorine- and saltwater-resistant fabric. Whether you’re in the pool or on the beach, UV SKINZ provides you with long-lasting sun protection!
COMPLETE SWIMMING SET – This swimwear set includes a short-sleeved tee, swimming shorts, and a reversible bucket hat. And the fabric is highly breathable for all-day comfort, even when wet!
